name: Dretch
languages: Abyssal; telepathy 60 ft. (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

action.name: Fetid Cloud (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 11}, each creature in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the dretch. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. While {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, the creature can take either an action or a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} on its turn, not both, and it can't take Reactions.
